snippet.title: Demolish & Build 3 - Release Date Reveal Trailer | Coming Sep 11th | Demolish Games
snippet.description:
Wishlist now 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1203670/Demolish__Build_3/
Coming to Steam on Sep 11th 🤩

Step into the boots of a demolition company owner. Crush, cut, dig, level and transport rubble to make way for new magnificent structures built with your own hands. 

Walk the path from a one-man company with nothing but a small plot of land and a simple shack to the owner of a huge vehicle park. Enjoy a world where every single tool, beam, and brick is physically simulated. Diverse tasks from your customers are an excellent opportunity to earn a lot of money. Will you be able to complete them quickly and accurately enough to meet their expectations?

Features:
🚧 Numerous vehicles and tools waiting for action
🚧 Varied missions and assignments
🚧 Earn money to buy machines and attachments of your choice
🚧 New physics and realistic destruction model
🚧 Appealing visuals and authentic construction site vibe


Follow our Social Media:
👷 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100069086002960
👷 Twitter / X: https://x.com/@demolishgames
👷 Discord: https://discord.gg/HqVqNRr9Uz
👷 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@demolish_games
